summary.para: Specifies the days of the week. Members might be combined using bitwise operations to specify multiple days.

member.remarks: The constants in the enumeration might be combined with bitwise operations to represent any combination of days. It is designed to be used in conjunction with the class to filter the days of the week for which the recurrence pattern applies.
